Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class PlayerHand

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.PlayerHand
All Implemented Interfaces:
GameSubject
public class PlayerHand extends Object implements GameSubject
This class represents the player hand, holding play cards and visible cards.

    • isHandFull

      public boolean isHandFull()
      Returns true if the number of play cards in the player's hand is equal or higher than the maximum number of cards a player can hold (3 by the rules), false otherwise.
      Returns:
      true if a card cannot be added to the player's hand, false otherwise

    • chooseObjective

      public void chooseObjective(int choice) throws IndexOutOfBoundsException, PlayerHandException
      Removes the secret objective not chosen from the player's hand.
      Parameters:
      choice - index of the chosen secret objective (1 or 2)
      Throws:
      IndexOutOfBoundsException - if choice <= 0 or choice > 2
      PlayerHandException - if secret objective was already chosen or if choices were never dealt
